ygData.subject: Faction Questions  (was: Bathory!)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been in Najena a few times.  The last time I was there my group was masacered after a very short distance. We didn t even kill anything except
ygData.messageBody:
I have been in Najena a few times. The last time I was
there my group was masacered after a very short distance.
We didn't even kill anything except skeletons.
Before that I was alone and only killed the 3 skeles at
the entrance.
I don't remember seeing any faction adjustments, but
does anyone know for sure with these?
Also in Befallen, do you only take a faction hit for
killing the Necro NPCs and initiates and named undead?
I have killed 3 or 4 initiates when grouped with a
fellow guildie. I remember seeing a faction hit for The
Dead. Is that only with the DEs or does that include
all Necros? How do you increase faction with The Dead?
This may also be why the DE Necro quest for Lindeal's
Testimony didn't work for me. Heh.
Thanks.

--
Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous




>From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
>I also want to see what my faction is before i go in
>there. I made the mistake in Najena by just going in
>there and killing stuff, when my faction was Dubious
>with all but the undead.
